name: Calm Painting
description:
Description

When you close your eyes to escape the noise, you often end up here. A calm place in which you can paint by a firepit.
There is a WebGL version but I recommend downloading the exe.

How to Play
  • ZQSD to move
  • LMB to paint
  • R to reset canvas
  • Esc to quit
Development

I made this simple scene because I wanted to have somewhere to play with the code I wrote for a VR school project. All Assets, Shaders, Meshes, and Scripts are made by me.
